external_references.source_name: Cisco Talos Transparent Tribe Education Campaign July 2022
external_references.description: N. Baisini. (2022, July 13). Transparent Tribe begins targeting education sector in latest campaign. Retrieved September 22, 2022.

objects.description: For [C0011](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0011), [Transparent Tribe](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0134) used malicious VBA macros within a lure document as part of the [Crimson](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0115) malware installation process onto a compromised host.(Citation: Cisco Talos Transparent Tribe Education Campaign July 2022)
